name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Python Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing robust backend systems. Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **REST**, **gRPC**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and cloud solutions using **AWS** (S3, EC2, Lambda, API Gateway). Expertise in architecting microservices and implementing **CI/CD** practices with tools like **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**. Experienced in leveraging **Machine Learning** and generative AI technologies including **GenAI**, **LangChain**, and **LangGraph** to enhance product functionalities. Adept at conducting code reviews, testing, and delivering high-quality applications in fast-paced environments, with a successful track record at esteemed organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:

Implemented **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, enhancing deployment efficiency by **40%**.
Developed event-driven solutions employing **Celery** and **Redis** for asynchronous processing, particularly handling **1,000+** financial transactions daily.
Employed **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, effectively managing cloud resources across **Azure App Services** to maintain high operational availability of **99.9%**.
Designed and maintained secure data pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, facilitating regulatory data exchange with a turnaround time reduced by **30%**.
Integrated OAuth2 and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication systems, improving security measures and user scalability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to solve complex system integration issues, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and overseeing release strategies using **CI/CD** practices with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**.

• Developed scalable and efficient **microservices** in **Python** using **FastAPI** to automate document workflows and streamline user onboarding, significantly reducing onboarding time by **30%**.
• Engineered event-driven architectures utilizing **Celery** and **Redis** for asynchronous processing of financial data, improving transaction processing speed by **25%**.
• Managed deployment of microservices via **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, with a fully automated CI/CD pipeline using **GitHub Actions**, enhancing deployment frequency by **40%**.
• Designed and implemented robust REST APIs with **OpenAPI** specifications, facilitating integration with third-party services and enhancing user experience.
• Established and maintained data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, achieving compliance with industry standards and reducing data processing time by **50%**.
• Conducted thorough security audits and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to enhance authentication and secure access, safeguarding sensitive information.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, ensuring smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, while effectively managing release schedules and expectations.

• Developed robust **microservices** architecture for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python** and **FastAPI**, resulting in a **30%** increase in trading operations efficiency.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, delivering up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, enhancing response times by **50ms**.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to expose data through **REST** APIs and WebSocket channels, ensuring seamless user interaction with the platform, leading to a **20%** improvement in user experience metrics.
• Ensured the platform met key regulatory requirements, including MiFID II and GDPR, while strictly adhering to internal data security protocols, conducting audits every **3 months**.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers to streamline QA and CI processes, thereby reducing bugs in production by **40%** during release cycles.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, minimizing delays by **70%** in task completion times.
• Contributed to code reviews and testing strategies in accordance with **CI/CD** methodologies using **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, increasing code quality and reducing deployment times by **30%**.
